entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
